code: @Test public void testFactoryBeanLifecycle() throws Exception {     EmbeddedDatabaseFactoryBean bean = new EmbeddedDatabaseFactoryBean().     ResourceDatabasePopulator populator = new ResourceDatabasePopulator(resource("db-schema.sql"), resource("db-test-data.sql")).     bean.setDatabasePopulator(populator).     bean.afterPropertiesSet().     DataSource ds = bean.getObject().     JdbcTemplate template = new JdbcTemplate(ds).     assertEquals("Keith", template.queryForObject("select NAME from T_TEST", String.class)).     bean.destroy(). }
